comments:
Build: wtp-sdk-M-M200603081620-200603081620 (including patches from https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=130246)

Repro:

-Create an EAR (and an associated module project)
-Add a Jar under EarContent
-Add the Jar as a "Jar Dependency" for the EAR
-This will add an dependent-module entry similar to the following:

<dependent-module deploy-path="/" handle="module:/classpath/lib//EAR/EarContent/jsr173_api.jar">
<dependency-type>uses</dependency-type>
</dependent-module>

-Exporting the EAR will fail with the following exception (you need to apply the patches from the bug referenced above to see this) because the workspace path is not being converted into a file system path:

Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: \EAR\EarContent\jsr173_api.jar (The system cannot find the path specified)
	at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
	at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.archive.operations.ComponentLoadStrategyImpl$FilesHolder.getInputStream(ComponentLoadStrategyImpl.java:139)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.archive.operations.ComponentLoadStrategyImpl.getInputStream(ComponentLoadStrategyImpl.java:386)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.impl.ContainerImpl.primGetInputStream(ContainerImpl.java:279)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.impl.FileImpl.getInputStream(FileImpl.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.helpers.FileIteratorImpl.getInputStream(FileIteratorImpl.java:40)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.commonarchivecore.internal.strategy.SaveStrategyImpl.save(SaveStrategyImpl.java:128)
	... 52 more
Added to the 102 hot list. Setting priority to P2 and target to 1.0.2 M102
This is fixed for the 03/15/06 WTP 1.0.2 driver and released to the 1.5 M6 head stream.
Was able to execute the repro without error
